CustomField.description: https://ikoussfsc.atlassian.net/browse/CLAIMSV2-87 Indicates whether the Case is In Litigation or not
CustomField.formula: Case__r.Legal__c && ( $Profile.Name != 'Claims Manager' && $Profile.Name != 'Commercial Claims Rep' && $Profile.Name != 'Residential Claims Rep' && $Profile.Name != 'Lab Manager' && $Profile.Name != 'Lab Technician' && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name != 'Plant Manager' && $Profile.Name != 'Iko Plants')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether the Case is In Litigation or not
CustomField.label: CaseInLegal
